languages.text: {n}Владайм стискивает зубы и мгновение молчит.{/n} "Ваше безрассудство может погубить не только вас, но и всю станцию! Но как пожелаете. Я велю, чтоб для вас расчистили небольшой проход. Учтите, что мгновенно это не произойдет..." {n}Владайм хмыкает.{/n} "Там все заминировано на совесть. Понадобятся дни... а может, и больше. Но свой вход вы получите".

{n}Vladaym clenches his teeth and remains silent for a moment.{/n} "Your imprudence could spell the end of you and the entire station! But — as you wish. I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It will take time, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your way in."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм стискивает зубы и мгновение молчит.{/n} "Ваше безрассудство может погубить не только вас, но и всю станцию! Но как пожелаете. Я велю, чтоб для вас расчистили небольшой проход. Учтите, что мгновенно это не произойдет..." {n}Владайм хмыкает.{/n} "Там все заминировано на совесть. Понадобятся дни... а может, и больше. Но свой вход вы получите".

I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It won't happen in a flash, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your entrance."

But you will get your way in."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは歯を食いしばって、しばらく押し黙った。{/n}「君の軽率な行動は、君とステーション全体の破滅に繋がりかねない！だが…仰せのままにしよう。部下に君用の小さな通路を空けさせる。だが、時間はかかるぞ…」{n}ヴラダイムは嘲笑する。{/n}「その場所はしっかり地雷を仕掛けてある。数日…いや、それ以上かかるな。しかし、いずれ通れるさ」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym clenches his teeth and remains silent for a moment.{/n} "Your imprudence could spell the end of you and the entire station! But — as you wish. I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It will take time, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your way in."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは歯を食いしばって、しばらく押し黙った。{/n}「君の軽率な行動は、君とステーション全体の破滅に繋がりかねない！だが…仰せのままにしよう。部下に君用の小さな通路を空けさせる。だが、時間はかかるぞ…」{n}ヴラダイムは嘲笑する。{/n}「その場所はしっかり地雷を仕掛けてある。数日…いや、それ以上かかるな。しかし、いずれ通れるさ」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆咬紧牙关，沉默半晌。{/n}“您的鲁莽可能会害死您自己，毁掉整座落脚港！不过……如您所愿，我会让我的人为您清出一条小道。不过，我得提醒您一下，这可能会花些时间……”{n}弗拉迪姆哼了一声。{/n}“那个地方已经埋好了地雷。清理地雷可能要花上几天的时间……或许更久，不过您肯定是能进去的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym clenches his teeth and remains silent for a moment.{/n} "Your imprudence could spell the end of you and the entire station! But — as you wish. I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It will take time, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your way in."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆咬紧牙关，沉默半晌。{/n}“您的鲁莽可能会害死您自己，毁掉整座落脚港！不过……如您所愿，我会让我的人为您清出一条小道。不过，我得提醒您一下，这可能会花些时间……”{n}弗拉迪姆哼了一声。{/n}“那个地方已经埋好了地雷。清理地雷可能要花上几天的时间……或许更久，不过您肯定是能进去的。”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym aprieta los dientes y guarda silencio unos instantes.{/n} «¡Su imprudencia podría costarle la vida a usted y a la estación entera! Pero... a sus órdenes. Haré que mis subordinados le abran un pasadizo. Requerirá su tiempo, eso sí...». {n}Vladaym se burla.{/n} «No han dejado rincón sin minar. Tardará unos días... si no más. Pero conseguirá entrar».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym clenches his teeth and remains silent for a moment.{/n} "Your imprudence could spell the end of you and the entire station! But — as you wish. I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It will take time, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your way in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym aprieta los dientes y guarda silencio unos instantes.{/n} «¡Su imprudencia podría costarle la vida a usted y a la estación entera! Pero... a sus órdenes. Haré que mis subordinados le abran un pasadizo. Requerirá su tiempo, eso sí...». {n}Vladaym se burla.{/n} «No han dejado rincón sin minar. Tardará unos días... si no más. Pero conseguirá entrar».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym serre les dents et garde le silence un moment avant de répondre :{/n} « Votre imprudence pourrait signer votre mort et celle de tous les habitants de cette station ! Mais... comme vous voudrez. Je vais dire à mes hommes de vous ouvrir un petit passage. Cela dit, il va leur falloir un peu de temps... » {n}Vladaym se racle la gorge.{/n} « L'endroit est envahi d'explosifs. Le déminage va prendre plusieurs jours... au moins. Mais soit, vous pourrez y entrer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym clenches his teeth and remains silent for a moment.{/n} "Your imprudence could spell the end of you and the entire station! But — as you wish. I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It will take time, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your way in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym serre les dents et garde le silence un moment avant de répondre :{/n} « Votre imprudence pourrait signer votre mort et celle de tous les habitants de cette station ! Mais... comme vous voudrez. Je vais dire à mes hommes de vous ouvrir un petit passage. Cela dit, il va leur falloir un peu de temps... » {n}Vladaym se racle la gorge.{/n} « L'endroit est envahi d'explosifs. Le déminage va prendre plusieurs jours... au moins. Mais soit, vous pourrez y entrer. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym beißt die Zähne zusammen und schweigt kurz.{/n} "Eure Unbedachtsamkeit könnte das Ende von Euch und der ganzen Station bedeuten! Aber ... wie Ihr wünscht. Ich lasse meine Leute einen kleinen Durchgang für Euch freiräumen. Aber das wird dauern ..." {n}Vladaym schnaubt spöttisch.{/n} "Alles wurde gründlich vermint. Es wird Tage dauern ... wenn nicht länger. Aber Ihr bekommt Euren Zugang hinein."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym clenches his teeth and remains silent for a moment.{/n} "Your imprudence could spell the end of you and the entire station! But — as you wish. I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It will take time, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your way in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym beißt die Zähne zusammen und schweigt kurz.{/n} "Eure Unbedachtsamkeit könnte das Ende von Euch und der ganzen Station bedeuten! Aber ... wie Ihr wünscht. Ich lasse meine Leute einen kleinen Durchgang für Euch freiräumen. Aber das wird dauern ..." {n}Vladaym schnaubt spöttisch.{/n} "Alles wurde gründlich vermint. Es wird Tage dauern ... wenn nicht länger. Aber Ihr bekommt Euren Zugang hinein."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, dişlerini sıkıp bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "İhtiyatsızlığınız hem sizin hem de tüm istasyonun sonunu getirebilir ama... Nasıl isterseniz. Adamlarıma sizin için küçük bir geçit açtıracağım. Lakin bilin ki biraz zaman alacak." {n}Vladaym dudak büküyor.{/n} "Semt karış karış mayınlanmış durumda. En aşağı birkaç gün alır, sonrasında içeri girebileceksiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym clenches his teeth and remains silent for a moment.{/n} "Your imprudence could spell the end of you and the entire station! But — as you wish. I will have my people clear a small passage for you. It will take time, mind you..." {n}Vladaym scoffs.{/n} "The place has been mined properly. It will take days... if not more. But you will get your way in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, dişlerini sıkıp bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "İhtiyatsızlığınız hem sizin hem de tüm istasyonun sonunu getirebilir ama... Nasıl isterseniz. Adamlarıma sizin için küçük bir geçit açtıracağım. Lakin bilin ki biraz zaman alacak." {n}Vladaym istihza ediyor.{/n} "Semt karış karış mayınlandı. En aşağı birkaç gün alacak ama içeri girebileceksiniz."
